testcase.classname: Verify the Pagantis Simulator for calculating Installment amount
testcase.name: Test scenario for Pagantis
testcase.system-out: Given user launched the pagantis............................................passed Then verify the title of page...............................................passed When installment of 12 months verify the installment amount.................passed Then verify the installment amount of 11 months.............................passed Then verify the installment amount of 10 months.............................passed Then verify the installment amount of 9 months..............................passed Then verify the installment amount of 8 months..............................passed Then verify the installment amount of 7 months..............................passed Then verify the installment amount of 6 months..............................passed Then verify the installment amount of 5 months..............................passed Then verify the installment amount of 4 months..............................passed Then verify the installment amount of 3 months..............................passed Then verify the installment amount of 2 months..............................passed Then Close the browser......................................................passed
